thread.title: Pakistani Police Investigate Killing of Chinese Shipping Executive in Karachi

author: Saeed Shah
title: Pakistani Police Investigate Killing of Chinese Shipping Executive in Karachi

organizations.name: pakistani police investigate killing of chinese shipping executive

text:
Counterterrorism police are investigating the killing of a Chinese executive in Pakistan’s largest city, an attack that comes as Beijing is investing more than $55 billion in an infrastructure-building program in the country.
Chen Zhu was the local managing director of Cosco Shipping Lines Co., which has operated in Pakistan since the 1990s. He was shot in the head Monday afternoon as he sat in the driver’s seat of a parked car in an upscale area of Karachi, police said.
